channel.title: Help Me Plz
channel.description: Ok So I Own My Own Server. :P But I Am A Shit Coder. I need help adding items to shops, and i wanna add shops at mage bank [b]Blow This [/b] is what i wanna add the shop off runelocus [but where do i add it,same with items] [code]//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 2538 2541 4715 0 0 0 0 0 2 //Pk Shop [/code] [b] Co Pked [Plz Help][/b]

item.title: Help Me Plz
item.dc:creator: @ashley001 ashley001
item.description:
@ashley001 wrote:

[quote=“co pked, post:1, topic:279650”]Ok So I Own My Own Server.
But I Am A Shit Coder.
I need help adding items to shops, and i wanna add shops at mage bank
Blow This is what i wanna add the shop off google [but where do i add it,same with items]

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 2538 2541 4715 0 0 0 0 0 2 //Pk Shop

Co Pked
[Plz Help][/quote]

If you’re adding that code, then add it to autospawn.java

item.title: Help Me Plz
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

If you are trying to add those items to your shop, go into your shops.cfg file. Also make sure you use tabs and not spaces.

Read full topic
